text: The title of Marquess of Hamilton has been created twice in British history. *For the creation of 1599, see Duke of Hamilton *For the creation of 1868, see Duke of Abercorn Category:Marquessates in the Peerage of Ireland Category:Extinct marquessates in the Peerage of Scotland Category:Noble titles created in 1599 Category:Noble titles created in 1868
title: Marquess of Hamilton
